description:
在如今的社会，随着科学技术的进步，人们的日常生活有了很大的变化，出门忘了带零钱也不用担心，手机微信、支付宝支付已经普遍运用到人们的日常生活中。但是，其中的问题也是不容忽视的，就是人们最担心的信息安全问题，个人信息，银行信息等等都是需要社会各方共同解决的问题，现就个人信息安全咱们来一篇英语四级写作预测范文。

要点提示：
第一段：说明信息安全问题日益重要
第二段：说明可能出现的问题和由此带来的危害
第三段：我们应该怎么做，提出解决方法。

参考例文：
　                                                Information Security
　　The human beings are stepping into the information society.The information industry develops very rapidly,so do the hackers,trick-playing teens,exploring children,fraudsters,and serious white-collar criminals.Thus,information security becomes an impending important issue.
　　In case of information breach,the victims-----government department, an organization or an institution,or a company will inevitably suffer great or small loss.Government may be threatened with national security. Companies may lose opportunities to develop new projects. And the public’s and users’ confidence will be damaged.
　　Then how to deal with this issue? Technology is only a partial solution to information security.What’s more important is that organizations and companies should promote the awareness on information security to its staff.However,since no system can ever be 100 percent secure,a prevention-only approach to information security management is not enough.Companies and organizations should adopt a dual approach to information security management by combing prevention and detection techniques.

信息作为一种资源，它的普遍性、共享性、增值性、可处理性和多效用性，使其对于人类具有特别重要的意义。信息安全的实质就是要保护信息系统或信息网络中的信息资源免受各种类型的威胁、干扰和破坏，即保证信息的安全性。信息安全是任何国家、政府、部门、行业都必须十分重视的问题，是一个不容忽视的国家安全战略。

title: 大学四级作文预测：信息安全问题

description:
智能手机已经走进千家万户，相信每个人都会被手机垃圾短信所困扰，我们每日都会收到一些来自不同渠道的垃圾信息，这些垃圾信息中隐藏着很多可以危害到我们私有财产安全的隐患，而还有很多是无意义的垃圾推广，今天小编就针对垃圾短信这个话题给大家整理一篇英语四级写作考试范文。

要点提示：
第一段：说明问题的严重性，手机垃圾短信很泛滥
第二段: 说明产生这种不良现象的原因
第三段：提出解决方法

参考例文：

　　With the increasing use of cell phones, spam messages have become a heated issue. According to a survey, on average, people receive about 40 pieces of spam message per month. Spam messages may disturb, confuse, or even threaten people at any time.
　　Generally, there are two reasons for the spam epidemic. On the one hand, due to the fact that text message is a comparatively cheap channel. Many companies take advantage of it to advertise their products or services. Whether people are willing to receive the message is neglected. On the other hand, operators, holding lots of information on cell phone users, sell the importance information and make money out of it.
　　To solve the problem of spam message, relative authorities and professionals should make joint efforts. The government should set up laws to severely punish the illegal advertisers and those who disclose users’ information. Cell phone researchers and developers should upgrade the products and enable them to delete the spam automatically. Should people act together, they will be free from the spam message.

小编的话：垃圾短信是一个不好的现象，更是一个顽疾。如果说平时偶尔收到几条垃圾短信还不算什么大事的话，那么在过节前后尤其是新年这段时间，垃圾短信的数量的增多已经明显影响了我们的正常生活。希望垃圾短信可以远离我们的世界，还我们一个宁静而美好的生活。
